results.name: Blue Pixie Parasol
results.description: Protects the bearer from rain and sun, but not from pixie mischief. Use to acquire a blue pixie parasol.

results.name: Pixie Parasol
results.description: Protects the bearer from rain and sun, but not from pixie mischief. Use to acquire a pixie parasol.

results.name: Mizutsune Parasol
results.description: An extravagant parasol fashioned after a creature of another world. Use to acquire a Mizutsune parasol.

results.name: Torch
results.description: Ideal for adventurers who like their light sources accompanied by the scent of burning pine sap. Use to acquire a torch.

results.name: White Embroidered Parasol
results.description: Because there is no such thing as “too many frills” on a fashion accessory─or so the enigmatic crafter of this parasol believed when they lovingly stitched it together. Use to acquire a white embroidered parasol.

results.name: Black Embroidered Parasol
results.description: Crafted with the finest lace gil can buy, this ornate parasol was designed for those fashionable frill-seekers who wish to accessorize in more subdued shades. Use to acquire a black embroidered parasol.

results.name: Loparasol
results.description: No matter your distance from the sun, this parasol will protect your skin and nurture your dreams. Use to acquire a Loparasol.

results.name: Pelupack
results.description: A rustic receptacle for all your Pelupossessions. Use to unlock a Pelupack.

results.name: Archon Egg Parasol
results.description: Finished in a striking yellow and golden trim, this accessory provides eggceptional protection against all but the worst of downpours. Use to unlock an Archon egg parasol.

results.name: Mandragora Parasol
results.description: Whether you want to blend in amongst potentially sentient seedkin, or simply keep your head dry, this parasol quite literally has you covered. Use to unlock a mandragora parasol.

results.name: Ribboned Parasol
results.description: Embellished with an array of red ribbons, this understated parasol is perfect for adding a splash of elegance to a rainy day ensemble. Use to unlock a ribboned parasol.

results.name: Bomb Parasol
results.description: A dazzling paper parasol bedecked with bombs of all sizes. Whether or not it is bomb-*proof*, however, is a different story. Use to unlock a bomb parasol.

results.name: Neon Parasol
results.description: Crafted with highly reflective and luminescent materials, this parasol is a bright ray of synthetic sunshine in inclement weather. Use to unlock a neon parasol.

results.name: Knapsack
results.description: Research has proven that wearing a knapsack or similar greatly reduces the likelihood of being pestered with questions about how you can carry so many items. Use to acquire a knapsack.

results.name: Giant Leaf Parasol
results.description: This is a crafted *imitation* of plant life, not simply errant vegetation cleverly pruned for capitalistic purposes. Honest. Use to acquire a giant leaf parasol.

results.name: Statice's Wings
results.description: For those who have indulged their mischievous side and now long for something *stronger*. Use to acquire a pair of Statice's wings.

results.name: Colorful Carrotsol
results.description: Nine out of ten Loporrits agree─this parasol is without flaw. The tenth could not be reached for comment due to a carrot-induced stomachache. Use to acquire a colorful carrotsol.

results.name: Tsukumogami Parasol
results.description: Designed in the likeness of a Far Eastern umbrella spirit, this parasol is certain to attract quizzical eyes (and slobbery tongues). Use to unlock a tsukumogami parasol.

results.name: Tactful Taskmaster Umbrella
results.description: A handy accessory to have when you need a large visual reminder that there is work to be done and schedules to keep. Use to acquire a tactful taskmaster umbrella.

results.name: Raindrop Defense System
results.description: This advanced piece of technology was painstakingly designed to protect its bearer from descending moisture─no matter the cost. Use to acquire a raindrop defense system.

results.name: Felicitous Furball Umbrella
results.description: Thankfully, this parasol is not nearly as indolent as its eponymous mammet, and will be sure to keep you dry during island squalls without a word of complaint. Use to acquire a felicitous furball umbrella.

results.name: Sabotender Parasol
results.description: Equipped with this accessory, none shall prevent you twirling to your heart's delight─or else. Use to acquire a sabotender parasol.

results.name: Bluepowder Pixie Wings
results.description: Indulge your mischievous side once more, this time in a charming shade of aquamarine. Use to acquire a pair of bluepowder pixie wings.

results.name: Blue Blossom Parasol
results.description: A white umbrella printed with a charming pattern of blue flowers, moogles, chocobos, and more. Use to unlock a blue blossom parasol.

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Thrall's Unrest, Anthemoessa Undertow, Drifter's Decay, The Forsaken Isle, Voyagers' Reprieve

results.name: White Lace Parasol
results.description: A frill-rimmed umbrella perfect for any weather except rain. Use to unlock a white lace parasol.

results.name: Archangel Wings
results.description: For those who go gaga for gold. Use to acquire a pair of archangel wings.

results.name: Pixie Wings
results.description: Perfect for those who like to indulge their mischievous side. Use to acquire a pair of pixie wings.

results.name: Diabolos Wings
results.description: Highly recommended for those who feel an affinity with voidsent. Use to acquire a pair of Diabolos wings.

sources.text: J'lakshai (Old Sharlayan) / Wilmetta (Radz-at-Han) - 800 Sacks Of Nuts

results.name: Fallen Angel Wings
results.description: The perfect solution for anyone seeking a pair of edgier angel wings. Use to acquire a pair of fallen angel wings.

sources.text: Edelina - Mor Dhona - 500 Bicolor Gemstone Vouchers

results.name: Red Moon Parasol
results.description: This elegant parasol features an image of a flaming moon, which seems strangely familiar... Use to acquire a red moon parasol.

results.name: Great Paraserpent
results.description: So lifelike that it appears about to let forth a mighty “scree!” at any moment. Use to acquire a great paraserpent.

results.name: Fat Cat Parasol
results.description: A charming parasol that's perfect for lounging about in the sun after filling your belly to bursting. Use to acquire a fat cat parasol.

results.name: Pleasant Dot Parasol
results.description: Should the weather prove so inclement, the skies so heavy with rain, that one is forced to rely upon a parasol, can it truly be called pleasant? (Yes. Just look at the name.) Use to acquire a pleasant dot parasol.

results.name: Pastoral Dot Parasol
results.description: It could be argued that any parasol could be made to appear pastoral if set against a suitably bucolic background. Use to acquire a pastoral dot parasol.

results.name: Prim Dot Parasol
results.description: Whether or not this parasol could be considered prim rather depends on the person holding it at the time. Use to acquire a prim dot parasol.

sources.text: Pixie Hoarder - Lydha Lran (Il Mheg) - 100,000 Gil

results.name: Gold Parasaucer
results.description: Nothing exudes an air of both wealth and whimsy as perfectly as a parasol decorated with stars and sabotenders, or so its creators convinced themselves when conjuring up this madcap design. Use to acquire a gold parasaucer.

results.name: Angel Wings
results.description: Perhaps a little *too* realistic. It would be wise to look out for a newly wingless angel seeking revenge. Use to acquire a pair of angel wings.

results.name: Classy Checkered Parasol
results.description: Were one to describe this parasol's pattern as “black-and-white check” then perhaps it might conjure images of chessboards and the like. Even so, it could be argued that this design is far classier. Use to acquire a classy checkered parasol.

results.name: Cheerful Checkered Parasol
results.description: There is something about a white background covered in many, many straight red lines that creates a cheerful atmosphere, though scholars have yet to determine exactly why. Use to acquire a cheerful checkered parasol.

results.name: Calming Checkered Parasol
results.description: Creates not only a small, portable circle of shade, but exudes a calming influence. Somehow. Use to acquire a calming checkered parasol.

results.name: Gold Paper Parasol
results.description: Unfortunately not covered in gold leaf, but fool's gold leaf, which is considerably cheaper on account of its rather silly name. Use to acquire a gold paper parasol.

results.name: Plum Paper Parasol
results.description: Named for its color, not because the paper is made from the wood of a plum tree. Use to acquire a plum paper parasol.

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Rogo-Tumu-Here's Repose, Bladefall Chasm, Thrall's Unrest, South Indigo Deep 2

results.name: Vermilion Paper Parasol
results.description: Though one might assume that paper is less than ideal for protecting oneself from the rain, this parasol has been treated with waterproof oil. The makers cannot, however, be held responsible for any puddles stepped in. Use to acquire a vermilion paper parasol.

results.name: Sky Blue Parasol
results.description: The perfect accessory to protect you from the summer sun, spring showers, and birds seeking to relieve themselves. Use to acquire a sky blue parasol.

results.name: Parasol
results.description: The perfect accessory to protect you from the summer sun, spring showers, and birds seeking to relieve themselves. Use to acquire a parasol.
